tool_description: Manages application errors with consistent error responses, logging, and debugging information for API endpoints.

error_format.description: Error response format: standard, detailed, minimal

log_level.description: Logging level: debug, info, warn, error

include_stack_trace.description: Include stack trace in error responses (development only)

error_messages: Invalid error format: Use one of [standard, detailed, minimal]
Invalid log level: Use one of [debug, info, warn, error]
usage: Configure error_format and log_level. Set include_stack_trace to true only in development environments for debugging.
